captions.text: Welcome to Dirt Quake !!
A completely crazy event that took place few weeks ago in England, in the Norfolk Arena.
The concept is really simple :
a flat track
one hundred mad riders
and some inappropriate bikes.
There, the most important thing is not what you ride
but how you ride it !
When we heard about this race, and saw the kind of crazy riders who took part,
One thing became  became obvious.
Serge Nuques, Groland Knight and veteran figure of Moto Journal’s WebTV
had to be part of the show
As an introduction to these moderns circus games
we were lucky to watch the fourth DTRA round, the British dirt track championship.
And we can assure you that it was a propper appetizer
This very competitive championship is divided in five classes,
among which a few French riders  shine :
Dimitri Coste, well-dressed, and always generous with the twistgrip.
Christophe Decombard, who fought for first place among the Rookies,
but suffered an engine problem just before the main event.
Or Frank Chatokhine,  who builds and races his own bikes.
and won the Vintage class on one of his creations.
But the Pro final was the most spectacular race of the first day
Big battle, intimidations, pig slides, overtakes everywhere !
All that without front brake, of course !
High level dirt track races are absolutely splendid.
By the way, congratulations to Tom Neave

for his spectacular riding style 
and his victory completely under control.
The next day, after such a show, Serge was a little bit frightened.
With a poor 23 horsepower engine
his SR 400  Yamaha was like a skinny chicken surrounded by dogs of war.
Not to mention the other riders !
With the presence of  Guy Martin
perched on a chopper that seemed to come straight from Hell.
And who was leading a bunch of  scary racers.
But the well trained organizers had a plan
and hired a fortune teller to comfort  those worried by their immediate future.
As a professional showman
our Grolandais then quickly made its mark in the middle of these Mayhem.
Not forgetting, of course, to squeeze the throttle !
Again, some French riders did excel.
Maxime and Hubert, for instance,
two young Parisians nutters who have opted to wear famous Italian plumbers suits.
Few ones will eat bananas…
Where do you hyde your special mushrooms ?
Ha, we ate them last night… yes we did…
Now they are digested
We will award a special mention to Luigi
who on his sharpened Vespa chained not less than 8 falls in the same race
Reaping the cheers of a captivated audience.
Taking advantage of a short break before the final
we went up to Gary Inman, the instigator of this organized mess,
to ask him a simple question: Why ?
In England, sometimes, the weather is nice.
And miraculously, the last races took place under a blazing sun.
Hot like a steamer, Serge entered the final alongside Mario, Evel Knievel and  a hord of bizarres riders
Quickly, the plumber and the knight  got up front
The pair had a great battle
but the Grolandais made a winning pass in the last corner !
A triumph that definitely propelled Serge to the rank of local hero.
In addition to this victory, he even received an award for the most stylish rider.
Before celebrating, in an incredible atmosphere, on a non-existent rostrum !

title: DIRT QUAKE : Serge Nuques, Guy Martin, des motos et de la boue !! (English subtitles)
